reviewDetails.comment: Very professional and personal. Explains the procedure very clearly and made many follow up calls.

Dr. Retting was my second opinion for this surgery. I am so glad I went with him. He is an excellent hand surgeon and those who work with him are equally professional in their follow-up and caring. He took a prudent approach to what my surgery required.
Great mid level, very knowledgeable and personable. Anytime I’ve been to his office the issue I have has been fully resolved through their work.
He is a fine Doctor, very friendly and highly competent and his staff is great! I highly recommend him.

Dr. Rettig is amazing!! He is so friendly and so nice. He reassured me more than any other doctor I've had in the last 3 decades. I had a pretty big laceration on my ring finger (which has delayed my engagement bc of the swelling) and couldn't extend it or feel it. But 2 months after surgery I have almost full mobility and regaining my feeling (it's supposed to take 9-12 months for full feeling). The swelling is almost done too! It was my first surgery ever and he made sure to call me right before and walked me through everything in person as well. I felt really comfortable. Leading up to the surgery and weeks after, he was extremely responsive on the portal if I had nerves/anxiety/questions-- answered in 30 minutes to an hour. Can't thank him enough!

reviewDetails.comment: I always go back to Dr. Fingensten : very professional and matter of fact
Dr. Fingesten is an excellent diagnostician and she is a caring physician interested in her patients.

I was the first appointment of the day and she showed up late.  Seemed like she was rushing through the appointment and was not very gentle with her movements.  She also kept trying to talk me out of lab tests that I wanted done because it seemed she didn't want to fill out the paperwork that was required.  I won't be returning.

Dr. Fingesten has a lovely bedside manner. She makes a person feel as if she truly cares. I would absolutely recommend her to others. She listens and takes the time to explains things. She is very thorough and an absolute delight as is her receptionist. I am so happy to have found her in your network.
she is sympathetic and efficient.  a good diagnostician and doctor.
Dr. Fingesten is very patient and helpful.
Clear and to the point.

reviewDetails.comment: Dr Strachan is a competent and skilled doctor. Her demeanor, lack of empathy and sometimes darn right dismissive attitude are a huge turnoff.
My daughters and I have been a patients  for over  10 years and have experienced drastic results for our acne and other issues.   I haughty recommend Dr Strachan.
Dr Strachan was ver beneficial in reducing my ache breakouts.  I have a new level of confidence based on her regimen. [PERSONAL INFO]
Great office, great Doctor.
Dr Strachan is very professional and explains any issues with detail and concern. No wait time,  friendly staff and clean office.

She was relatively rude when I tried to ask questions that she wouldn’t answer. After all I pay her for answering questions that I have and she refused some of them. 

I will be requesting a refund.
Dirty office, rude doctor, total waste of time.

It was difficult for me to find a doctor who dealt with hair loss, particularly for  African American woman.  Dr. Strachen was careful to examine my scalp and hair. The extended staff was helpful in finding a pharmacy that is convenient and suitable for me.

I am very glad to have been referred to him and feel confident in the care he provides.
